pr_title: [GEOS-9731] Wfs-templating allow Iterating Builder to handle also json array without source

timeline.message: [GEOS-9731] Wfs-templating allow Iterating Builder to handle also json array without source
[GEOS-9731] Wfs-templating allow Iterating Builder to handle also json array without source

timeline.bodyText: So we can write a NULL key?
timeline.author: nmco

replies.bodyText: evaluating on null since key might be an env function or a literal. In both cases the evaluate(Object o) method doesn't need any argument. I've added a clarifying comment.
replies.author: taba90
